name: METAL HELL DEMO

DISCLAIMER: 

READ THE README

This is a very early version of the demo and there are plans for the demo to include much more content when it's complete, The demo is planned to include the first 3 floors

_______________

Information

The game features a sprawling maze filled with secrets that the player must traverse endlessly, the isolating environment mixed with random events will keep players tense as they explore the endless sprawl of metal meeting sky, There is no escape, one can only lose themselves further down this metal hell.

WASD move

L Strafe

Q LookBack

ScrollWheel to look up + down
